about_the_game:
The blobs, a nearly extinct alien species, experienced a horrible catastrophe in their home planet that forced them to find a safe place. After discovering dimension travelling, their attempts were unsuccesful. They found themselves with no luck, until a helping hand came around.



These blobs are really needy, and they always require food and affection. In order to satisfy their needs, you must have enough Blob Points to purchase certain items.

Blob Points

The Blob Points are a currency that is developed with your interactions with the blobs. It can be by feeding them, giving them cool toys and even petting them for a ridiculous amount of time.

Explore the vast collection of sweets and toys in the Shop Menu to ensure your blobs' happiness and hunger



So, now that your blobs are all set, it's time to make them a cozy and warm home. In Build Mode, you will find ALL of the necessary building objects to make the best place for your blobs to live in. This includes, walls, wallpapers, doors, furniture and lighting items.

These items come with multiple vibrant colors that allow you to customize your builds and make a richer environment for the blobs.



Remember, it is always important to check on your blobs! Sometimes they might be hungry, tired or have a desire for affection. In Inspect Mode, you are able to view the blobs' needs, and consider adding items that will keep them in a healthy state.

short_description: This Cute Sidescroller RPG is all about taking care of little aliens called blobs! Give them unique names, check their vitals, build colorful houses, play and feed them with a variety of sweets when you have all the time in the world.
